name: Running Out Of Space (Leo Garcez)
description:
Game made for Epic Mega Jam 2021.

CLAIM YOUR SPACE!

It's a party game where you need to catch all the keyboard keys before time runs out. The recommended number of players are 3 or 4, but is possible play with 2 people

Controls (Key/Space):

WASD - Movement 

 Mouse 1 - Dash/Attack

Mouse 2 -  Steal key/ Speed boost

Instructions:

Keys need to collect three keys and go to green pipe in the bottom-right corner

Space need to destroy keys until the time runs out.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We have four lobbies to test online, but for a better experience the local has no delay.
